name: pisces
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like two fish: Theta and Omicron are stars in Pisces.
[ C or U ] the 12th sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 20 February to 20 March, represented by two fish, or a person born during this period: She was born in March, under the sign of Pisces. My brother is a Pisces.
More examplesFewer examplesToday the vernal equinox is in Pisces the Fishes.Pisces is a line of very faint stars.She's a Pisces so she notices everything.Along with Cancer and Scorpio, Pisces is a water sign.

the twelfth sign of the zodiac, covering the period February 19 to March 20 and represented by two fish, or a person born during this period
